author: niallp
msg: Refactoring - move mine/encoding content type detection into the calculateHttpEncoding() method where its used

author: niallp
msg: Refactoring to remove the InputStream from XmlStreamReaderException in r1004109 means we don't need to pass the InputStream to the calculateRawEncoding() and calculateHttpEncoding() methods

author: niallp
msg: "Message formats are not synchronized. It is recommended to create separate format instances for each thread. If multiple threads access a format concurrently, it must be synchronized externally."
